item.description: Demise and Fall of Roman M. Pyre by Dwight Kemper Roman M. Pyre made a big splash in the publishing industry with his gossip rag, “Confidentially”. Now Mr. Pyre has made another big splash. On the sidewalk after a plunge from a high rise apartment window. Did he fall or was he pushed? We have as suspects: two gossip columnists, a lawyer, a publishing magnate and his wishy washy son, and a movie star. Into the fray steps a ham actor and his female partner, who are hired to help them all with their alibi. Medway Players Medway Public Library 26 High Street, Medway, MA 02053
item.name: Original Play this Friday Night!
